TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ZipFileExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class ZipFileExtensions abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供 和 類別的擴充方法。

span.span: Provides extension methods for the and classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別僅包含靜態方法，延伸和類別。The class contains only static methods that extend the and classes. 您未建立的執行個體類別; 相反地，您可以使用這些方法的執行個體從或。You do not create an instance of the class; instead, you use these methods from instances of or . 若要使用的擴充方法，您必須參考`System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`專案中的組件。To use the extension methods, you must reference the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly in your project. `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`組件不提供[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]應用程式。The `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly is not available in [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps. 因此，和類別 (兩者都是在`System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`組件) 中未提供[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]應用程式。Therefore, the and classes (both of which are in the `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assembly) are not available in [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps. 在[!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)]應用程式，使用中的方法使用的壓縮檔案， ， ，和。In [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps, you work with compressed files by using the methods in , , , and . 類別包含三個方法來擴充:The class contains three methods that extend : - - - 類別包含兩個方法來擴充:The class contains two methods that extend : - - ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何從現有的檔案，zip 封存中建立新的項目和解壓縮封存至目錄的內容。The following example shows how to create a new entry in a zip archive from an existing file, and extract the contents of the archive to a directory. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program3.vb#3)] 下列範例會示範如何逐一查看的 zip 封存的內容，將副檔名為.txt 的檔案解壓縮。The following example shows how to iterate through the contents of a zip archive and extract files that have a .txt extension. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 透過將檔案壓縮並加入至 zip 封存的方式進行封存。

span.span: Archives a file by compressing it and adding it to the zip archive.

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry CreateEntryFromFile (this System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive destination, string sourceFileName, string entryName);

.method public static hidebysig class System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry CreateEntryFromFile(class System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive destination, string sourceFileName, string entryName) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function CreateEntryFromFile (destination As ZipArchive, sourceFileName As String, entryName As String) As ZipArchiveEntry

param.name: destination
param.span: 要將檔案加入至其中的 Zip 封存。

span.span: The zip archive to add the file to.

param.name: sourceFileName
param.span: 要封存的檔案之路徑。

span.span: The path to the file to be archived.

param.span: 您可以指定相對或絕對路徑。

span.span: You can specify either a relative or an absolute path.

param.span: 相對路徑會解譯為與目前的工作目錄相對。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

param.name: entryName
param.span: 要在 Zip 封存中建立之項目的名稱。

span.span: The name of the entry to create in the zip archive.

summary.span: 透過將檔案壓縮並加入至 zip 封存的方式進行封存。

span.span: Archives a file by compressing it and adding it to the zip archive.

returns.span: zip 封存中之新項目的包裝函式。

span.span: A wrapper for the new entry in the zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新的項目，封存中所包含的所指定的檔案內容`sourceFileName`。The new entry in the archive contains the contents of the file specified by `sourceFileName`. 如果具有指定名稱的項目 (`entryName`) 已經封存，在第二個項目會建立具有相同的名稱。If an entry with the specified name (`entryName`) already exists in the archive, a second entry is created with an identical name. 項目的屬性設定為上次變更檔案系統上的檔案的時間。The property of the entry is set to the last time the file on the file system was changed. 當`ZipArchiveMode.Update`已存在，大小限制的項目僅限於。When `ZipArchiveMode.Update` is present, the size limit of an entry is limited to . 這項限制是因為更新模式使用在內部以允許更新封存時所需的搜尋和整數的大小上限等於This limit is because update mode uses a internally to allow the seeking required when updating an archive, and has a maximum equal to the size of an int. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何從現有的檔案的 zip 封存中建立新的項目。The following example shows how to create a new entry in a zip archive from an existing file. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program3.vb#3)]

span.span: In , the specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.

exception.span: 例如，在 Windows 平台上，路徑不得超過 248 個字元，檔案名稱則不得超過 260 個字元。

span.span: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must not exceed 248 characters, and file names must not exceed 260 characters.

exception.span: 無效 (例如，位於未對應的磁碟機上)。

span.span: is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).

span.span: The file specified by cannot be opened, or is too large to be updated (current limit is [`Int32.MaxValue`](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/api/system.int32.maxvalue)).
specifies a directory.

span.span: The caller does not have the required permission to access the file specified by .

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry CreateEntryFromFile (this System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive destination, string sourceFileName, string entryName, System.IO.Compression.CompressionLevel compressionLevel);

.method public static hidebysig class System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry CreateEntryFromFile(class System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive destination, string sourceFileName, string entryName, valuetype System.IO.Compression.CompressionLevel compressionLevel) cil managed

param.name: destination
param.span: 要將檔案加入至其中的 Zip 封存。

span.span: The zip archive to add the file to.

param.name: sourceFileName
param.span: 要封存的檔案之路徑。

span.span: The path to the file to be archived.

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates whether to emphasize speed or compression effectiveness when creating the entry.

summary.span: 透過將檔案以指定之壓縮等級壓縮並加入至 zip 封存的方式進行封存。

span.span: Archives a file by compressing it using the specified compression level and adding it to the zip archive.

span.span: A wrapper for the new entry in the zip archive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 新的項目，封存中所包含的所指定的檔案內容`sourceFileName`。The new entry in the archive contains the contents of the file specified by `sourceFileName`. 如果具有指定名稱的項目 (`entryName`) 已經封存，在第二個項目會建立具有相同的名稱。If an entry with the specified name (`entryName`) already exists in the archive, a second entry is created with an identical name. 項目的屬性設定為上次變更檔案系統上的檔案的時間。The property of the entry is set to the last time the file on the file system was changed. 當`ZipArchiveMode.Update`已存在，大小限制的項目僅限於。When `ZipArchiveMode.Update` is present, the size limit of an entry is limited to . 這項限制是因為更新模式使用在內部以允許更新封存時所需的搜尋和整數的大小上限等於This limit is because update mode uses a internally to allow the seeking required when updating an archive, and has a maximum equal to the size of an int. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何從現有的檔案，zip 封存中建立新的項目，並指定壓縮層級。The following example shows how to create a new entry in a zip archive from an existing file, and specify the compression level. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program4.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program4.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ExtractToDirectory (this System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive source, string destinationDirectoryName);
.method public static hidebysig void ExtractToDirectory(class System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive source, string destinationDirectoryName) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Sub ExtractToDirectory (source As ZipArchive, destinationDirectoryName As String)

param.name: source
param.span: 從中解壓縮檔案的 zip 封存。

span.span: The zip archive to extract files from.

param.name: destinationDirectoryName
param.span: 要在其中放置所解壓縮檔案之目錄的路徑。

span.span: The path to the directory to place the extracted files in.

param.span: 您可以指定相對或絕對路徑。

span.span: You can specify either a relative or an absolute path.

param.span: 相對路徑會解譯為與目前的工作目錄相對。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

summary.span: 將 zip 封存中的所有檔案都解壓縮到檔案系統上的目錄。

span.span: Extracts all the files in the zip archive to a directory on the file system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會建立所指定的目錄`destinationDirectoryName`。This method creates the directory specified by `destinationDirectoryName`. 如果目的目錄已經存在，這個方法不會覆寫它。它會擲回例外狀況。If the destination directory already exists, this method does not overwrite it; it throws an exception. 方法也會建立反映階層 zip 封存中的子目錄。The method also creates subdirectories that reflect the hierarchy in the zip archive. 如果在擷取期間發生錯誤，封存會保留部分擷取。If an error occurs during extraction, the archive remains partially extracted. 每個已解壓縮的檔案具有相同的相對路徑，以指定的目錄`destinationDirectoryName`作為其來源項目都有封存的根目錄。Each extracted file has the same relative path to the directory specified by `destinationDirectoryName` as its source entry has to the root of the archive. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何從現有的檔案，zip 封存中建立新的項目和解壓縮封存到新的目錄。The following example shows how to create a new entry in a zip archive from an existing file, and extract the archive to a new directory. 編譯器才能在此程式碼範例中，您必須參考`System.IO.Compression`和`System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`您的專案中的組件。In order to compiler this code example, you must reference the `System.IO.Compression` and `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assemblies in your project. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program3.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program3.vb#3)]

exception.span: 是 、只包含空白字元，或包含至少一個無效字元。

span.span: is , contains only white space, or contains at least one invalid character.
is .

exception.span: 指定的路徑超過系統定義的最大長度。

span.span: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must not exceed 248 characters, and file names must not exceed 260 characters.

span.span: The specified path is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).

exception.span: 所指定的目錄已經存在。

span.span: The directory specified by already exists.

exception.span: 封存中的項目名稱是 、只包含空白字元，或包含至少一個無效字元。

span.span: The name of an entry in the archive is , contains only white space, or contains at least one invalid character.
-or-

exception.span: 從封存中解壓縮項目，會建立不在 所指定目錄中的檔案。

span.span: Extracting an entry from the archive would create a file that is outside the directory specified by .

exception.span: (例如，如果項目名稱包含上層目錄存取子，則可能發生這種情況)。

span.span: (For example, this might happen if the entry name contains parent directory accessors.)
-or-

exception.span: 封存中有兩個以上同名的項目。

span.span: Two or more entries in the archive have the same name.

exception.span: 呼叫端沒有寫入目的地目錄的必要權限。

span.span: The caller does not have the required permission to write to the destination directory.
contains an invalid format.

exception.span: 封存項目找不到或損毀。

span.span: An archive entry cannot be found or is corrupt.
-or-

exception.span: 封存項目是使用不支援的壓縮方法進行壓縮。

span.span: An archive entry was compressed by using a compression method that is not supported.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void ExtractToFile (this System.IO.Compression.ZipArchiveEntry source, string destinationFileName);

<Extension()> Public Sub ExtractToFile (source As ZipArchiveEntry, destinationFileName As String)

param.name: source
param.span: 要從中解壓縮檔案的 zip 封存項目。

span.span: The zip archive entry to extract a file from.

param.name: destinationFileName
param.span: 要從中建立項目內容的檔案路徑。

span.span: The path of the file to create from the contents of the entry.

param.span: 您可以指定相對或絕對路徑。

span.span: You can specify either a relative or an absolute path.

param.span: 相對路徑會解譯為與目前的工作目錄相對。

span.span: A relative path is interpreted as relative to the current working directory.

summary.span: 將 zip 封存中的項目解壓縮至檔案。

span.span: Extracts an entry in the zip archive to a file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果目的地檔案已經存在，這個方法不會覆寫它。它會擲回例外狀況。If the destination file already exists, this method does not overwrite it; it throws an exception. 若要覆寫現有的檔案，請使用改用方法多載。To overwrite an existing file, use the method overload instead. 檔案的上次寫入時間設定為上次變更 zip 封存中的項目; 的時間這個值會儲存在屬性。The last write time of the file is set to the last time the entry in the zip archive was changed; this value is stored in the property. 您無法使用這個方法來擷取目錄，使用方法改為。You cannot use this method to extract a directory; use the method instead. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何逐一查看的 zip 封存檔案的內容，將副檔名為.txt 的檔案解壓縮。The following example shows how to iterate through the contents of a zip archive file and extract files that have a .txt extension. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 擷取檔案 zip 封存中的項目，並選擇性地覆寫具有相同名稱的現有檔案。

span.span: Extracts an entry in the zip archive to a file, and optionally overwrites an existing file that has the same name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 檔案的上次寫入時間設定為上次變更 zip 封存中的項目; 的時間這個值會儲存在屬性。The last write time of the file is set to the last time the entry in the zip archive was changed; this value is stored in the property. 您無法使用這個方法來擷取目錄，使用方法改為。You cannot use this method to extract a directory; use the method instead. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何逐一查看 zip 封存檔案的內容，將副檔名為.txt 的檔案解壓縮。The following example shows how to iterate through the contents of a zip archive file, and extract files that have a .txt extension. 它會覆寫現有的檔案具有相同名稱的目的地資料夾中。It overwrites an existing file that has the same name in the destination folder. 編譯器才能在此程式碼範例中，您必須參考`System.IO.Compression`和`System.IO.Compression.FileSystem`您的專案中的組件。In order to compiler this code example, you must reference the `System.IO.Compression` and `System.IO.Compression.FileSystem` assemblies in your project. [!code-csharp[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/cs/program2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.IO.Compression.ZipArchive#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.compression.ziparchive/vb/program2.vb#2)]

exception.span: 為零長度字串，只包含空格，或包含一或多個如 所定義的無效字元。

span.span: is a zero-length string, contains only white space, or contains one or more invalid characters as defined by .
-or-
specifies a directory.
is .

exception.span: 指定的路徑、檔案名稱，或兩者都超出系統定義的長度上限。

span.span: The specified path, file name, or both exceed the system-defined maximum length.

exception.span: 例如，在 Windows 平台上，路徑不得超過 248 個字元，檔案名稱則不得超過 260 個字元。

span.span: For example, on Windows-based platforms, paths must not exceed 248 characters, and file names must not exceed 260 characters.

exception.span: 指定的路徑無效 (例如，它位於未對應的磁碟機上)。

span.span: The specified path is invalid (for example, it is on an unmapped drive).
already exists and is .
-or-
An I/O error occurred.
-or-
The entry is currently open for writing.
-or-
The entry has been deleted from the archive.

exception.span: 呼叫端不具所需的權限，無法建立新的檔案。

span.span: The caller does not have the required permission to create the new file.

exception.span: 封存遺漏項目，或是項目已損毀且無法讀取。

span.span: The entry is missing from the archive or is corrupt and cannot be read.
-or-

exception.span: 已使用不受支援的壓縮方法壓縮項目。

span.span: The entry has been compressed by using a compression method that is not supported.

exception.span: 已處置此項目所屬的 zip 封存。

span.span: The zip archive that this entry belongs to has been disposed.
is in an invalid format.
-or-

exception.span: 這個項目的 zip 封存已經以 模式開啟，而該模式不允許擷取項目。

span.span: The zip archive for this entry was opened in mode, which does not permit the retrieval of entries.
